name: Tofoon
startIntroPart1: May our ɡod's blessinɡ be upon you, Tcawfaa Cwa Chiawhwa, Emperor of our eternal nation of Tofoon!
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: Well, hope you know what you are doing.
defeated: Our people shall forever remember this day.
introduction: Greetings, I am Cwa Ĉiawhwa, Emperor of all of Tofoon. Extend our warm welcome to you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
[+10]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
